Race.SpecificTitle: Chief of Police -- Town of Welsh
PW School District -- Local Option - Term Limits
Race.FullText:
"LOCAL OPTION ELECTION
Within Jefferson Davis Parish School District:
Shall the number of terms of office that any member of the school board may serve be limited to three consecutive four-year terms?"

Race.SpecificTitle: Jeff.Davis Central Waterwks Dist. -- 9.9 Mills - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Jefferson Davis Central Waterworks District Proposition
(Tax Renewal)

Summary:  Authority to renew the levy of a 9.9 mills tax for a period of 10 years for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining or operating waterworks facilities in the Jefferson Davis Central Waterworks District.
Race.FullText: Shall Jefferson Davis Central Waterworks District, Jefferson Davis Parish, State of Louisiana (the "District"), be authorized to levy a tax of nine and nine tenths (9.9) mills on all property subject to taxation within the District (an estimated $435,600 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the Tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2014 and ending with the year 2023, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining or operating waterworks facilities in the District?
